features: FOR CHILDREN AGES 1+: Contains 26 milligrams of brain nourishing omega-3 DHA to assure brain support and rapid development
EASY-TO-DIGEST: Enfagrow Premium Gentlease formula contains proteins that are partially broken-down that are easy to digest to ease fussiness, gas and crying
PROPRIETARY TRIPLE HEALTH GUARD BLEND: Contains omega-3 DHA to provide brain support, baby probiotics and vitamins for immune support, and 22 total nutrients for growth
BRAIN DEVELOPMENT: Enfagrow Premium Gentlease contains expert recommended omega-3 DHA and iron - two building blocks of a toddler's brain
EXPERT RECOMMENDED DHA: Enfagrow Premium Gentlease has expert recommended omega-3 DHA which supports brain development
#1 TRUSTED BRAND: Enfamil is the #1 Trusted Brand for Brain-building & Immune Support
PEDIATRICIAN RECOMMENDED: Enfamil is the #1 infant formula brand recommended by pediatricians
body.description: Gassy toddler? Enfagrow PREMIUM Gentlease Toddler Nutritional Drink is designed for sensitive, still-growing bellies! Enfagrow Premium Gentlease Toddler Nutritional Milk Drink is a nutritional toddler drink made with real milk and fortified with vitamins. Enfagrow is for growing children ages 1 year & up. The transition from baby formula or breast milk to cow's milk can lead to an 80% drop in brain nourishing Omega-3 DHA consumption. And 85% of brain growth happens in your baby's first three years. That's why it's important to provide brain support with Enfagrow Gentlease Toddler Nutritional Milk Drink. It contains 26mg of omega DHA per serving, Enfamil is the #1 pediatrician recommended brand of Infant Formula - QuintilesIMS, using the ProVoice Survey fielded from October 1, 2016 to September 30, 2017. Not made with genetically modified ingredients, but trace amounts of genetically engineered materials may be present in the product from manufacturing environments and process sources.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This formula has been a great transition to our routine as we move to 100% whole milk. I feel good my toddler is getting nutrients with the formula as he is exploring new foods. Gives a momma piece of mind.

reviews.reviewText: Both of my kids love this milk. They even gained weight cause of this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Good product always on time when I need it daughter loves it the best

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smooth transition! Better than milk!
reviews.reviewText: My 10 month old was on Gerber Soothe Pro. Then another recall happened, due to a bacteria in the formula, in the midst of an already inconvenient formula shortage. Long story short I was left with one can of Sooth Pro and I had to make a decision to transition her. I decided to try whole milk. It gave her diarrhea and upset stomach so it decided to try Gentlease toddler formula! This was the easiest and best transition!! I was so happy!! She was a little hesitant at first but after a bottle or two she took it with no problem. She has had no stomach issues and no fussiness. I 100% recommend! My little doesn’t drink 6oz bottles so I just use 2 scoops of formula to 3oz of water to prevent wasting the formula.

reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Enfamil gentle ease formula
reviews.reviewText: I have been usin other enfamil iron based formulas which was very hard for my baby to digest also it made my baby constipated them I start using this enfagrow gentle ease and it worked great for me my baby wasn’t contipated at all and she was having a good sleep too
